android.car.vms

类 VmsPublisherClientService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • android.car.vms.VmsPublisherClientService
  • 已过时。 
    Use VmsClientManager instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class VmsPublisherClientService
extends Service
    API implementation of a Vehicle Map Service publisher client. All publisher clients must inherit from this class and export it as a service, and the service be added to either the vmsPublisherSystemClients or vmsPublisherUserClients arrays in the Car service configuration, depending on which user the client will run as. The com.android.car.VmsPublisherService will then bind to this service, with the onVmsPublisherServiceReady() callback notifying the client implementation when the connection is established and publisher operations can be called. Publishers must also register a publisher ID by calling getPublisherId(byte[]).

      • publish

        public final void publish(VmsLayer layer,
                          int publisherId,
                          byte[] payload)
        已过时。 
        Publishes a data packet to subscribers. Publishers must only publish packets for the layers that they have made offerings for.
        参数:
        layer - layer to publish to
        publisherId - ID of the publisher publishing the message
        payload - data packet to be sent
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if publisher services are not available

      • setLayersOffering

        public final void setLayersOffering(VmsLayersOffering offering)
        已过时。 
        Sets the layers offered by a specific publisher.
        参数:
        offering - layers being offered for subscription by the publisher
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if publisher services are not available

      • getPublisherId

        public final int getPublisherId(byte[] publisherInfo)
        已过时。 
        Acquires a publisher ID for a serialized publisher description. Multiple calls to this method with the same information will return the same publisher ID.
        参数:
        publisherInfo - serialized publisher description information, in a vendor-specific format
        返回:
        a publisher ID for the given publisher description
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if publisher services are not available

      • getSubscriptions

        已过时。

        返回:
        state of layer subscriptions
        抛出:
